attributes.action: Liverpool fc "get JOSE MOURINIO AS MANAGER"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wont Win the Premiership with Rafa Benitez's rotation policy so everyone in favour or Jose Mourinio for a steady ship please vote yes and bring back pass n move and quality attacking football like man u but better!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
